levels.description: Immediately recover all HP; ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, attack range <@ba.vup>+{ability_range_forward_extend}</>, attack target count <@ba.vup>+2</> and Max HP <@ba.vup>+{max_hp}</>. Gradually lose HP (HP loss caps at {hp_ratio:0%}/second after <@ba.vup>{duration}</> seconds); <@ba.rem>Unlimited duration</>
